title: FIFA World Cup top goalscorers
summary: More than 2,000 goals have been scored in the 21 editions of the FIFA World Cup final tournaments, not counting penalties scored during shoot-outs.[1] Since the first goal scored by French player Lucien Laurent at the 1930 FIFA World Cup,[2] more than 1,250 footballers have scored goals in the World Cup final tournaments,[3] of whom just 97 have scored five or more.
